review_discussion.author: pi8027
review_discussion.comment: If suffixes `l` and `r` stand for left and right distributivity, this should be named `subn_maxl`.

review_discussion.author: pi8027
review_discussion.comment: `leqP` has been relocated in #429 after `maxn`/`minn` lemmas, so this does not work. I guess we should use `leq_total` instead here.

review_discussion.author: pi8027
review_discussion.comment:
```suggestion
move=> m n p; apply/eqP.
rewrite eqn_leq !geq_max !leq_sub2r leq_max ?leqnn ?andbT ?orbT // /maxn.
by case: (_ < _); rewrite leqnn // orbT.
```

review_discussion.author: pi8027
review_discussion.comment:
```suggestion
move=> m n p; apply/eqP.
rewrite eqn_leq !leq_min !leq_sub2r geq_min ?leqnn ?orbT //= /minn.
by case: (_ < _); rewrite leqnn // orbT.
```

review_discussion.author: pi8027
review_discussion.comment:
```suggestion
- Added theorems about subtraction and min and max :
       `subn_minl` and `subn_maxl` in `ssrnat.v`
```

commits.author: thery
commits.message: Extra theorems about subn min and max
